cube20_singlegrain_msize1.description: Cube of side length 20 with a single grain. Mesh size  is 1.

cube20_singlegrain_msize2.description: Cube of side length 20 with a single grain. Mesh size  is 2.

cube50_singlegrain_msize1.description: Cube of side length 50 with a single grain. Mesh size  is 1.

cube50_singlegrain_msize2.description: Cube of side length 50 with a single grain. Mesh size  is 2.

cube40_equi_grains8_gsize20.description: Cube of side length 40 with 8 grains of size 20 generated uniformly.

cube80_equi_grains8_gsize40.description: Cube of side length 80 with 8 grains of size 40 generated uniformly.

cube160_equi_grains8_gsize80.description: Cube of side length 160 with 8 grains of size 80 generated uniformly.

cube40_colu_grains8_gsize20.description: Cube of side length 40 with 8 grains of size 20 generated on a 2D face and extruded in the third dimension.

cube80_colu_grains8_gsize40.description: Cube of side length 80 with 8 grains of size 40 generated on a 2D face and extruded in the third dimension.

cube160_colu_grains8_gsize80.description: Cube of side length 160 with 8 grains of size 80 generated on a 2D face and extruded in the third dimension.

cube40_3plat_grains12_gsize20.description: Cube of side length 40 with 12 grains of size 20 generated as regular parallelepipeda on three layers.

cube80_3plat_grains12_gsize40.description: Cube of side length 80 with 12 grains of size 40 generated as regular parallelepipeda on three layers.

cube160_3plat_grains12_gsize80.description: Cube of side length 160 with 12 grains of size 80 generated as regular parallelepipeda on three layers.
